name: Chronos Process Integration
tag_list: inventory-software, inventory-system, inventory-management-software, free-inventory-software, small-business, inventory
overview:
Chronos Process Integration Sdn. Bhd. commenced business in 2002 as a Process Consulting and Software Development company. Chronos specializes in Process Flow analysis, Layout Planning, Industrial Engineering, ICT and Kaizen activities (Man, Method, Machine and Material).

Chronos mission is to create value in the delivery of business methods and software automation tools for the manufacturing and energy sector.Chronos was awarded with the MSC-Status in November 2002 by the Multimedia Development Corporation (MDC) in recognition of its development of Manufacturing Information & Execution Systems (MIES) for the manufacturing sector.Chronos is committed to deliver flexible and practical solutions for the manufacturing value chain and energy industry enabling clients to compete more effectively in todays challenging business environment.
